```{r}
source("zac_demo_files/plot_tg.R")
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("zac_demo_files/study3A.csv")
```   

```{r}
dc <- data$dc
ac <- data$ac
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac)
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac, type = "quadrants")
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac, type = "horizontal")
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac, type = "vertical")
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac, type = "constraints")
```

```{r}
plot_tg(dc, ac, type = "depth")
```
